author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-WildHorse Resource Development Says Entered Into Fourth Amendment To Credit Agreement
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - WildHorse Resource Development Corp :
* WILDHORSE RESOURCE DEVELOPMENT SAYS ‍ON MARCH 23, CO ENTERED INTO FOURTH AMENDMENT TO CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED AS OF DEC 19, 2016 - SEC FILING​
* WILDHORSE RESOURCE - ‍FOURTH AMENDMENT INCREASES BORROWING BASE TO $1.05 BILLION AND AGGREGATE ELECTED COMMITMENT AMOUNTS TO $1.05 BILLION​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2I6KyMY ) Further company coverage:
